page.title: 05LOCAL POLICEMAN
page.content:
P.C.PAUL HOLLAND was born 42 years ago in Hertfordshire.Before becoming a policeman 19 years ago he was a toolmaker.He is married with 3 children:_ David 21,Paul 19 and Julie 18,and has lived in Balcombe for 11 years.Before that he worked in Hove and Burgess Hill.
He is a general purpose policeman and works either an early or late shift.He also has to answer calls in the middle of the night should they arise.He has many different duties e.g. checking suspect or stolen cars on A23.He may be called out by a resident in the village who has a problem.His duties also change with the seasons.In the summer P.C. Holland is kept very busy with traffic duties as many people travel through Sussex on their holidays or Agricultural shows.In the
